mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article ( id, user_id, title, summary, content_url, cover_image, category_id, status, is_top, is_original, view_count, like_count, comment_count, collect_count, audit_status, publish_time, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{contentUrl}, #{coverImage}, #{categoryId}, #{status}, #{isTop}, #{isOriginal}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{collectCount}, #{auditStatus}, #{publishTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM article a INNER JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON a.id = atr.article_id WHERE atr.tag_id = #{tagId} AND a.status = 1 AND a.audit_status = 1 ORDER BY a.publish_time DESC
SELECT * FROM article WHERE status = 2 AND audit_status = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM article WHERE status = 1 AND audit_status = 1 ORDER BY publish_time DESC
